title: Execute a Product Recall
description: A quality issue requires a Class II recall of a specific lot of a drug product. An agent must identify all distributors who received the lot.

tasks.description: Identify the specific product and lot number to be recalled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the product and lot number from the quality alert.

tasks.description: Query the serialization and traceability system for the specified lot number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the system to trace the lot from the manufacturing site to initial distribution.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all wholesale distributors and pharmacies that received products from this lot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a complete and accurate list of all downstream partners.

tasks.description: Draft and send a recall notification to all affected partners.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a template to create and send the official recall notice.
